review.reviewBody: Portion sizes are good, flavor also good. I ordered the Garden mix salad which could benefit from something extra, it wasn't filling on its own but felt healthy. The vegetarian tofu vermicelli was great, tofu was nice and crispy and flavorful, not something every restaurant can accomplish!
Best pho in the city !!!!! Addicted to the spring rolls
no jalapeños and only 4 basil leaves provided, broth is okay. I can get better for less $$ 5 minutes up the road...next time I will do the drive myself for better pho @ $15 for a large
best by far. shaken beef, beef vermicelli, wonton soup. no other pho place is on the same level as Mai's
love this place, everything is always fresh, tasty and decently portioned
